Name: Average time from \Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE\ to \Declaration REJECTED by BUDGET OWNER\
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Declaration REJECTED by BUDGET OWNER'

Name: Average time between \Declaration REJECTED by BUDGET OWNER\ and \Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE\ for re-submission
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration REJECTED by BUDGET OWNER' and activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'

Name: Average resolution time for cases involving \Declaration REJECTED by BUDGET OWNER\
Metric: The average of the duration between activity Declaration REJECTED by BUDGET OWNER and the end of the case

Name: Average time from \Declaration REJECTED by BUDGET OWNER\ to \Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION\
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration REJECTED by BUDGET OWNER' and activity 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION'

Name: Total time spent in \Declaration REJECTED by BUDGET OWNER\ across all cases
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity Declaration REJECTED by BUDGET OWNER and the end of the case

Name: Minimum time taken for a case to be resolved after \Declaration REJECTED by BUDGET OWNER\
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity Declaration REJECTED by BUDGET OWNER and the end of the case

Name: Average time from \Declaration REJECTED by BUDGET OWNER\ to \Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR\
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration REJECTED by BUDGET OWNER' and activity 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR'

Name: Total resolution time of cases with \Declaration REJECTED by BUDGET OWNER\ before successful payment
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Declaration REJECTED by BUDGET OWNER' and activity 'Payment Handled'

Name: Average time for re-submission after \Declaration REJECTED by BUDGET OWNER\ compared to \Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER\
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration REJECTED by BUDGET OWNER' and activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'

Name: Total time spent in \Declaration REJECTED by BUDGET OWNER\ for cases that required director's approval
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity Declaration REJECTED by BUDGET OWNER and the end of the case

Name: Minimum time from \Declaration REJECTED by BUDGET OWNER\ to successful \Request Payment\
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Declaration REJECTED by BUDGET OWNER' and activity 'Request Payment'

Name: Average time from \Declaration REJECTED by BUDGET OWNER\ to \Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER\ in re-submitted cases
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration REJECTED by BUDGET OWNER' and activity 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER'

Name: Total time for cases to move from \Declaration REJECTED by BUDGET OWNER\ to \Payment Handled\
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Declaration REJECTED by BUDGET OWNER' and activity 'Payment Handled'

Name: Average waiting time before \Declaration REJECTED by BUDGET OWNER\ is addressed and moved to the next step
Metric: The average of the duration between activity Declaration REJECTED by BUDGET OWNER and the end of the case

Name: Minimum resolution time of cases with \Declaration REJECTED by BUDGET OWNER\ compared to those with \Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION\
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity Declaration REJECTED by BUDGET OWNER and the end of the case
